data.text:
@cobuspienaar 

Please can you test that you get an image back from the UAT web service with the following search criteria:

6004135119085
904/2013 Brakpan M
CaseID: 281290

Also, when I try using the case editor (admin@e4.co.za) I get the following error message when I try to pull the above case up so I dont know what the imageID is.

Procedure or function CAPTURING_SELECT_CaseDetails_ByCaseID has too many arguments specified.
